title: The Adamantine Forge
content:
ubble at X: -672 Y: 443, you may talk to the Duergar and convince them to tell you what they are looking for. They will reveal that they are looking for the Adamantine Forge, which will unlock this quest, but you have to clear the Rubble to go on.

Despite what the Duergars say, you can actually jump / Misty Step from the area where Nere is trapped up to the area where the "Underdark - Ancient Forge" fast travel location is to unlock the entire area, bypassing the need to clear the rubble.

Clea
